articles.author: Tom Warren
articles.title: Microsoft faces UK antitrust investigation over hiring of Inflection AI staff - The Verge
articles.description: UK regulators are looking more closely at Microsoft’s AI investments. The hiring of Inflection AI staff earlier this year will be probed under merger rules in the UK.
articles.content:
Microsoft faces UK antitrust investigation over hiring of Inflection AI staff
